attributes.action: Review the pathway for girls with a query of Autism.
attributes.additional_details:
To help lots our of girls with autism get the correct help and support and for parents to be heard and recognised.
As a parent we know our children. 
We should not have to feel like its our fault our children have struggles. 
Our children are different and unique and the quicker it's looked into deeper and more thorough the quicker girls can be able to reach there full potential with the correct support and guidance.
attributes.background:
Please  allow professionals  to look deeper into our children (girls) needs  in any setting  not just school.
Please do not ignore parents with concerns.

rejection.details:
Decisions about pathways to treatment for autism is a matter for local NHS trusts, not the Government or House of Commons.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign: 

Fund better mental health support for children with ASD: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329919

Mandatory Autism awareness training for mainstream schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552054
